firstAidCourse.title: You will learn how to use surveying instruments like the level and total station, and you will go for practical training to work with the instruments yourself.
firstAidCourse.subtitle: Theoretical lectures
firstAidCourse.title10: Measuring blood pressure, pulse, respiration, and temperature

ICDL.title: In construction, you train and learn from experts and professionals with many years of experience, truly preparing for the job market‚Äînot just taking a course and that's it.
ICDL.title1: You will learn how to choose your device.
ICDL.title2: We will learn how to work with Windows
ICDL.title3: We will learn how to manage files and the practical way to organize them.
ICDL.title4: We will learn how to compress and decompress files and set a password.
ICDL.title5: We will learn how to install and uninstall programs.
ICDL.title6: We will learn the difference between the 64-bit version and the 32-bit (or 86) version
ICDL.title7: We will learn how to retrieve hidden files from a USB flash drive.
ICDL.subtitle: Inshallah, we will learn a lot during the course, which will be beneficial whether you need to create a presentation for yourself or work with formulas and large numbers. We will also cover infographics, which are extremely useful and can be applied in many areas. The topics mentioned are just examples‚Äîwe will be learning much more throughout the course.If you're looking to build a CV for a course that includes all 7 modules (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, IT, Windows, and Internet), this course will cover everything. Each program will be explained in detail, and you will practice and apply everything you learn.We will start with Microsoft Word and go through each program step by step.
ICDL.subtitle2: You will learn the basic menus File - Home - Insert - Design - Layout - Review Power Point program You will learn how to make a distinctive presentation SmartArt - Transition - Animation - Slide Show Excel program You will learn how to format tables and charts Styles Tables - Charts Link - Sheet Options Access program You will learn how to create a database with tables and codes, enter data, modify it, and also delete data. Create table in design view - Create table in sql code - Insert into data - Update date - Delete data

scratch.title1: Many parents now want to see their children excel and no longer want to instill the idea that they must become doctors or engineers, and that anything else means failure or lack of intelligence. However, this mindset has changed. Some parents now prefer to see their children stand out from the rest or pursue what they truly love, which will ultimately make them excel in it.
scratch.title2: Nowadays, children are highly engaged with technology, especially video games. So why not open the door for them to study what they are passionate about? That‚Äôs why we will teach them programming through Scratch, a specialized program designed to introduce children to coding.
scratch.subtitle: Advantages of Scratch
scratch.p2: Teaching children multiple programming languages is important for them.
scratch.p3: Providing a unique environment of games and graphic stories for children.
scratch.p4: Developing children's creativity and enhancing their various skills.
scratch.p5: The Scratch program is suitable for all age groups who use it.
scratch.p6: It supports multiple languages, with Arabic being one of the most important.
scratch.p7: It provides a large amount of visual and audio content for users free of charge.
scratch.p8: Reducing the difficulties presented by programming languages.
scratch.p9: Early and simplified learning of various programming languages.
scratch.subtitle2: Projects and Application Levels of the Scratch Program
scratch.p10: Level 1: Controlling the Movement of Objects
scratch.p11: Level 2: Changing the Appearance of Objects.
scratch.p13: Level 4: Creating a Dialogue Between Two Characters.
scratch.p14: Course Duration: 8 lectures, twice a week.

summer.title: A great opportunity for engineering and surveying students. The Training Administration announces the opening of applications for the summer training program for students of Engineering Colleges, the Faculty of Arts (Surveying Department), and governmental and private engineering and surveying institutes at Al-Benaa Institution. The application period is from 15/4/2022 to 31/6/2022.
summer.p1: Fully equipped sites with all the necessary devices.
summer.p2: Upon completion, you receive an experience certificate.
summer.p3: You will be trained by experienced engineers in the field.
summer.p4: Available Departments: Architectural, Civil, Electrical, and Surveying.

Professional Training.title: Professional Training
Professional Training.description: Don't let your grades stop you from reaching your dream job! If you love journalism and media üé•üé§ and dream of becoming a journalist or presenter, then your place is with us in the professional training program in journalism and media at the International Building Center. The opportunity is open to all high school, Al-Azhar, and diploma graduates, as well as institute and university students, without restrictions on the year of graduation! üë®‚Äçüéìüë©‚Äçüéì

Journalism and Media.description: The International Building Center in the Journalism and Media Department provides outstanding education that embraces diversity and aims to transfer knowledge while adhering to media education quality standards. Trainees will study the following sections within the Media Section:
Journalism and Media.point2: Public Relations and Marketing Communications Section
Journalism and Media.subtitle: One of the key features of the center:
Journalism and Media.point4: Modern programs and curricula that align with the needs of the job market in various media specialties.
Journalism and Media.point5: The faculty members have the highest level of academic expertise.
Journalism and Media.point6: Training for students at major journalistic and media institutions through partnerships with many private organizations.
Journalism and Media.point8: Holding seminars and discussion panels with journalists and media professionals in various specialties.
Journalism and Media.point9: Starting practical training and job market simulation in studios and labs affiliated with the center from the beginning of the student's enrollment at the center.
Journalism and Media.point10: Providing summer training within accredited media institutions and news websites in accordance with many cooperation protocols.
Journalism and Media.point11: We teach you writing, editing, directing, photography, production, radio and television.
Journalism and Media.point12: We will also teach you how to be a professional journalist who can deliver information to people in a correct and objective way.
Journalism and Media.point13: Visits are organized periodically to major media institutions such as (Youm7, Al-Watan Newspaper, Trend News, Channel 7).
Journalism and Media.point15: Public relations and marketing in companies, institutions, banks and advertising companies.
Journalism and Media.point16: Radio and television as a director, broadcaster, or producer of television or radio programmes.

Professional Training.description2: It is considered one of the most important departments that we offer at the International Construction Center because we have advantages that distinguish us from others (because we have permanent license No. 7 at the republic level and the first at the Upper Egypt level)

Tourism and Hotels.point1: We prepare you for the labor market.
Tourism and Hotels.point2: You will learn from experts and international chefs.
Tourism and Hotels.point3: She studies the basics of hotel and tourism services, as well as languages, airline and tourism business.
Tourism and Hotels.point4: Practical training in major hotels, restaurants, airlines and tourism companies.
Tourism and Hotels.point5: You will receive tools and clothing for practicing the profession.
Tourism and Hotels.point6: Training and practical work are the main focus of the study.
Tourism and Hotels.subtitle: And don't forget the accredited certificates:
Tourism and Hotels.point7: Certificates of experience and training from major hotels, restaurants, tourism and travel companies.
Tourism and Hotels.point8: Support with courses and grants in languages ‚Äã‚Äãand hotel services available at the center.

Professional Training.description3: It is considered one of the most important departments that we offer at the International Construction Center because we have advantages that distinguish us from others (because we have permanent license No. 7 at the republic level and the first at the Upper Egypt level)

Surveying and Mapping.point1: You will be trained by highly experienced engineers and university professors.
Surveying and Mapping.point2: Practical training within major construction, contracting and surveying companies.
Surveying and Mapping.point3: You will receive a helmet, safety vest and professional practice tools.
Surveying and Mapping.point4: Training and practical work is the main focus of the study.
Surveying and Mapping.subtitle: And don't forget the accredited certificates:
Surveying and Mapping.point5: Certificates of experience from practical training in the Surveying and Mapping Department.
Surveying and Mapping.point6: Support with courses and grants in surveying and mapping.

Professional Training.description4: It is considered one of the most important sections that we offer at the International Construction Center because we have advantages that distinguish us from others (because we have permanent license No. 7 at the republic level and the first at the Upper Egypt level)

ComputerSection.point1: It is taught by experienced engineers and university professors.
ComputerSection.point2: Training and practical work are the main focus of the study.
ComputerSection.subtitle1: Creativa training is done within the university.
ComputerSection.point3: The training will be practical in laboratories equipped with all types of modern devices.
ComputerSection.point4: You study everything related to computer science, from computer networks, programming languages, hardware maintenance, and software.
ComputerSection.point5: Certificates of experience from practical training in the computer section.
ComputerSection.point7: Support with accredited courses and grants in computer science.

Professional Training.description5: It is considered one of the most important departments that we offer at the International Construction Center because we have advantages that distinguish us from others (because we have permanent license No. 7 at the republic level and the first at the Upper Egypt level)

Languages and Translation.subtitle1: The Languages section includes the following specializations:
Languages and Translation.point4: You will study the language of your choice during the two years.
Languages and Translation.point5: You will be trained by the most prominent university professors and certified translators.
Languages and Translation.point6: The main focus of the study is on pronunciation and actual practice of the language.
Languages and Translation.point7: Also, practical training in major certified translators' offices.
Languages and Translation.subtitle2: And don't forget the approved certificates:
Languages and Translation.point8: Certificate of experience from one of the largest certified translation offices.
Languages and Translation.point9: Support with language courses and scholarships available at the center.

Professional Training.title6: Business Administration and Secretarial Studies Section
Professional Training.description6: It is considered one of the most important sections that we offer at the International Construction Center because we have advantages that distinguish us from others (because we have permanent license No. 7 at the republic level and the first at the Upper Egypt level)

Business.point1: Taught by experienced accountants and university professors.
Business.point2: Training and practical work is the main focus of the study.
Business.point3: You will study practical work in major tax and legal accounting offices.
Business.point4: You will learn business administration with ease because you will receive practical training in the Tax Authority.
Business.point5: You will learn and practice what you have learned practically on real work to keep pace with developments in the labor market.
Business.point6: You can do the equation and complete the Faculty of Commerce through us.
Business.subtitle: Don't forget the approved certificates

Business.point8: Certificate of experience from a major legal and tax accounting office.

Professional Training.mainTitlePart2: Nursing and Emergency Specialization - Analysis and Radiology Specialization
Professional Training.description7: It is considered one of the most important sections that we offer at the International Construction Center because we have advantages that distinguish us from others (because we have permanent license No. 7 at the republic level and the first at the Upper Egypt level)
Professional Training.point1: You will be trained by expert doctors, nurses and university professors.
Professional Training.point2: Practical training during study in government and private hospitals.
Professional Training.point3: Training in analysis laboratories equipped with all devices.
Professional Training.point4: You will learn all the medical terms that will qualify you to work in the largest hospitals.
Professional Training.point5: The main focus of the study is practical training.
Professional Training.subtitle: And don't forget the accredited certificates:
Professional Training.point6: You will get certificates of experience and training from the hospitals where you will receive practical training.
Professional Training.point7: You will get a certificate accredited by the largest government universities.
Professional Training.point8: Support with courses to keep up with the job market.
